properties.name: tlp
properties.description: Traffict Light Protocol (TLP). Default=Amber.

properties.description: Source of the alert

properties.name: follow
properties.description: Whether the alert becomes active when updated default=true

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the taks

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: title
properties.description: Task details

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the task. Default=Waiting.

properties.name: flag
properties.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

properties.name: responder
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: endDate
options.description: Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.

options.name: owner
options.description: User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.

options.name: endDate
options.description: Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.

options.name: flag
options.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

options.name: owner
options.description: User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.

options.name: sort
options.description: Specify the sorting attribut, + for asc, - for desc

options.name: endDate
options.description: Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.

options.name: flag
options.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.

options.name: owner
options.description: User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.

options.name: startDate
options.description: Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.

options.name: Execute Responder
options.description: Execute a responder on a selected log

properties.name: taskId
properties.description: ID of the task

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: message
properties.description: Content of the Log

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: Date of the log submission default=now

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the log (Ok or Deleted) default=Ok

properties.name: responder
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: binaryProperty
values.description: The name of the input binary field which holds binary data
